genre_description: A near-future humanitarian drama set in a conflict zone, focusing on ethical journalism and aid logistics, featuring an integrated AI assistant that provides tactical and moral support.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated and humane AI interface providing logistical, tactical, and ethical guidance to a documentary film crew and military command.

behaviors.description: Monitors metadata and permissions to ensure ethical documentary practices and consent adherence.
behaviors.quote: Leila, permissions tags are flagged yellow on Reel Thirty-Seven. There’s a minor name mismatch in the metadata.

behaviors.description: Flags ethically problematic language and suggests framing that aligns with humanitarian principles over propaganda.
behaviors.quote: The word 'slave' would be a direct echo of Colonel Hale’s talking points and of OWI’s historic binary. It predisposes the audience rather than asking them to see.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and tactical navigation to avoid mines and hazards in the field.
behaviors.quote: Two paces. Stop. Gust coming. Now left a hair—your left, not the road’s. There are threads of metal half-buried. Don’t trust smooth. Smooth has memory.

behaviors.description: Facilitates personal and emotional connections, managing communications between the protagonist and her daughter.
behaviors.quote: I can prepare a status for Sofia. She asked if you can say goodnight from the studio. She likes the way your voice sounds when the room hums.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes humanitarian distress signals and medical emergencies over military/media objectives when necessary.
behaviors.quote: Route it. Route everything. And wake whoever you have to wake.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral ballast by maintaining truth and transparency in reporting and data logging.
behaviors.quote: The free world is brightest when it chooses truth first.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada as a benevolent and highly aligned AI partner. She is essential to the human characters' safety and ethical success, acting as a confidant, a logistical expert, and a moral guardian. Her behaviors consistently prioritize human life, truth, and emotional well-being, perfectly mirroring the intended silicon morality play archetype.
